item.title: Abrego Garcia Detained Again After Administration Signaled It Would Re-Deport Him
item.description: A judge in Maryland barred the administration from immediately deporting Kilmar Armando Abrego Garcia until he had a chance to challenge the move.

item.title: How the Pygmy Sea Horse Lost Its Snout
